CORONATION Street actress Maggie Fox has died in a "sudden accident".
The star - who appeared in two roles in the long-running soap - passed away surrounded by her "completely heartbroken" family.
… [+1574 chars]

articles.title: Mermaid, fish, donkey or seal: viral optical illusion breaking Twitter explained - what do you see? - NationalWorld
articles.description: First it was the blue and black dress versus gold and white, then it was Laurel versus Yanny - now the latest optical illusion asks: mermaid, fish, donkey or seal?
articles.content:
After the internet had just recovered from the unanswerable wheels versus door debate, a new optical illusion has appeared on Twitter ready to get arguments flowing once again.
